name: Bar4Bar: Beat Battle
description:
wi12yn's first game

Hold down two number keys to select an NPC generation and path

Timed turn based battle, 3 moves per turn until someone runs out of money.

PATHS 

Low (1), Mid (9), Highway (7)

(GENERATIONS WINS) > (generation loses)

$1 Zoomer (5) > $10 Boomer (3) > $2 Millennial (6) > $5 genXer (2)

The game composes a soundtrack that is reflective of the players/opponents moves.

Ex: Mid + Boomer = Electric guitar

Skipping a move will skip the beat, 3 skips in a row will drop the beat and cost you $10. NPCs cost money to make, but if they successfully hit the opponent, they will steal back their cost and add it to you bank.

Wish List to add to game:

1. Exit/Restart game

2. Beat slow down clip when beat "dropped" after 3 skips

3. NPCs slowing down in front of certain buildings

4. Turn indicators

5. FIX ALL THE BUGS, there are many
